ygData.subject: Help with Aviaks
ygData.msgSnippet: Today while killing Aviaks in South Karana with a friend, we were sitting and medding up and out of the blue 2-3 Aviaks Avo s came over and started beating the
ygData.messageBody:
Today while killing Aviaks in South Karana with a friend, we were sitting
and medding up and out of the blue 2-3 Aviaks Avo's came over and started
beating the crap out of us. Needless to say we both died, thing is I
thought Aviaks only attacked when attacked or when they saw you attacking
another one? If so how come they came up and attacked us when all we were
doing was sitting and medding?

**************************
Azor Spellbound
Lvl 20 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************
